short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces certain images during your web browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trolling with Love is all about injecting humor into your web browsing experience. Inspired by a popular Chrome extension, this Firefox add-on allows you to randomly replace a fraction of images on web pages with either Nicolas Cage or pony images, depending on your preference.

Key Features:

Image Replacement: Choose between Nicolas Cage or pony images to replace a small percentage of images on web pages.
Percentage Setting: Control how often images are replaced, with a default of 1%.
Automatic Increase: Option to increase the replacement probability by 0.5% daily for added surprise.
Personalization: Add your name for identification within the extension.

Enjoy the reactions of your friends as they encounter unexpected images while browsing, all in good fun with "Trolling with Love"!
